item.title: Atomic Habits
item.description: A practical guide to building good habits and breaking bad ones through small, incremental changes.

item.title: Attention Is All You Need
item.description: The seminal paper that introduced the Transformer architecture, revolutionizing natural language processing by relying entirely on attention mechanisms.

item.title: BERT: Pre-training of Deep Bidirectional Transformers
item.description: BERT introduces bidirectional training for language models, achieving state-of-the-art results across multiple NLP tasks.

item.title: Designing Data-Intensive Applications
item.description: The definitive guide to understanding the architecture of modern data systems, covering reliability, scalability, and maintainability.

item.title: Emergence in Software Systems
item.description: Exploring how complex behaviors emerge from simple rules in software systems

item.title: Language Models are Unsupervised Multitask Learners
item.description: GPT-2 demonstrates that language models can perform multiple tasks without explicit supervision when trained at sufficient scale.

item.title: The Evolution of Developer Tools
item.description: Rough thoughts on how developer tools have evolved and where they might be heading

item.title: Welcome to My Digital Space
item.description: An introduction to my blog and what you can expect to find here.
